name: PHP-Layers
author: Brendan Coles <bcoles@gmail.com>
description:
PHP Layers Menu is a hierarchical menu system to prepare "on the fly" DHTML menus relying on the PHP scripting engine for the processing of data items."
website "http://phplayersmenu.sourceforge.net

matches.text: .png" alt="Powered by PHP Layers Menu" height="31" width="88" />

matches.regexp: (?-mix:<!-- end of menu header - PHP Layers Menu ([^\s]+) \(C\) [0-9]{4}-[0-9]{4} Marco Pratesi)
